head.supplied: 20 July 1858 ¶ ¶ Referring to the statement of your willingness to act on the Comittee for the management of the proposed Zoological Gardens, ¶ I have the honor to inform you that His Excellency the...

div.p: No. 1582, unit 3, p. 164, VPRS 1187 outward correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

Referring to the statement of your willingness to act on the Comittee for the management of the proposed Zoological Gardens,
See M to J. O'Shanassy, 7 July 1858. I have the honor to inform you that His Excellency the Governor has been pleased to appoint you to be a member of the Committee the other members of which are named on the margin
S. G. Evans, C. Pasley, F. McCoy, M, F. Selwyn, T. Black, T. Embling, D. S. Campbell, H. J. Chambers, W. H. Archer. In letters to these members an extra paragraph was added to the above circular: 'Further I have to inform you that Dr Mueller has consented to act as Hony Secretary & that he will convene a preliminary meeting at an early day'.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
